links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[25 April]] [[1966]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Rayner Unwin]]'''.

*'''Subject:''' Reply to a letter from Rayner Unwin from [[19 April]] [[1966]], concerning a new dust-jacket design for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and material for inclusion in ''[[The Tolkien Reader]]''.
*'''Publication:''' Extracts from the letter were published in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]''.
*'''Archive:''' Tolkien-[[Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] archive, [[HarperCollins]].<ref>{{CG|C}}, pp. 662-3</ref><ref>{{CG|RG}}, p. 1024</ref>
==See also==

*[[Letter to Rayner Unwin (12 May 1955)]]
